attributes.action: Overturn the decision made by Hutton to keep secret for 70 years further evidence related to the death of Dr David Kelly and to order a formal inquest as requested by medical experts immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are not satisfied that the unusualness of this decision is justified or warranted.

http://www.thisislondon.co.uk/standard/article-23798597-70-year-gag-on-kelly-death-evidence.do

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1245599/David-Kelly-post-mortem-kept-secret-70-years-doctors-accuse-Lord-Hutton-concealing-vital-information.html 

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/top-stories/2010/01/25/70-year-gag-over-kelly-115875-21992989/

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/7066383/David-Kelly-death-evidence-to-be-kept-secret-for-70-years.html

http://www.guardian.co.uk/politics/2010/jan/25/david-kelly-suicide-hutton-inquiry

Medical experts have called for a formal inquest into Kelly's death: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk/8397625.stm

We place our trust NOT in the opinions of Hutton but in the opinions of both the press and medical experts and urge the Prime Minister to do the same and agree to the requests made for a formal inquest with full access to all information that can be considered as evidence by medical experts if not also the press.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
